      static String dataTableToString(DataTable table) 
      static java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter determineDateTimeFormat(String input, String... customDateFormats)
      Try to determine the date format of the given String.
      static boolean equalsIncData(Object o1, Object o2)
      Returns true if both given objects are null, false if one is null and the other is not, true if both objects are instances of Data and o1.equalTo(o2) returns true (see Data.equalTo(hivis.data.Data)), otherwise the result of o1.equals(o2).
      static Class<?> getCommonAncestorClass(Class<?> c1, Class<?> c2)
      Given two classes, determine the common ancestor class.

      Given two numeric class types, return the most generic.
      static java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor parseDateTime(String input, java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter format)
      Utility method to parse a date/time string with a formatter, attempting to get the most applicable type of TemporalAccessor object via format.parseBest.
      static Date temporalAccessorToDate(java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor ta)
      Attempt to convert the given TemporalAccessor to the equivalent Date.

    • Method Detail

      • equalsIncData

        public static boolean equalsIncData(Object o1,
                                    Object o2)
        Returns true if both given objects are null, false if one is null and the other is not, true if both objects are instances of Data and o1.equalTo(o2) returns true (see Data.equalTo(hivis.data.Data)), otherwise the result of o1.equals(o2).

      • dataTableToString

        public static String dataTableToString(DataTable table)

      • getEnvelopeNumberType

        public static Class<? extends Number> getEnvelopeNumberType(Class<Number> c1,
                                                            Class<Number> c2,
                                                            boolean dataLossWarnMessage)
        Given two numeric class types, return the most generic.
        Parameters:
        c1 - Numeric type 1
        c2 - Numeric type 2.
        dataLossWarnMessage - Whether to show a warning if data loss might occur (when one class is floating-point and the other long).

      • getCommonAncestorClass

        public static Class<?> getCommonAncestorClass(Class<?> c1,
                                              Class<?> c2)
        Given two classes, determine the common ancestor class.
        Returns:
        The common ancestor class

      • determineDateTimeFormat

        public static java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter determineDateTimeFormat(String input,
                                                                         String... customDateFormats)
        Try to determine the date format of the given String.
        Parameters:
        input - The String containing a date and optional time.
        customDateFormats - One or more date formats to use instead of the standard date formats. Time elements may also be included. See https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/index.html?java/time/format/DateTimeFormatter.html
        Returns:
        A DateTimeFormatter object able to parse the given date/time, or null if the format could not be determined.

      • parseDateTime

        public static java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor parseDateTime(String input,
                                                                java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter format)
                                                         throws java.time.format.DateTimeParseException
        Utility method to parse a date/time string with a formatter, attempting to get the most applicable type of TemporalAccessor object via format.parseBest. The TemporalAccessor subclasses tried in order are ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDateTime, LocalDate, OffsetTime, LocalTime.
        Throws:
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException

      • temporalAccessorToDate

        public static Date temporalAccessorToDate(java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor ta)
        Attempt to convert the given TemporalAccessor to the equivalent Date.
